text.__SUMMARY__: Euphorbia nigrispinoides is a species of plant in the family Euphorbiaceae. It is endemic to Ethiopia.
text.References: Gilbert, Michael George (1992). "Notes on Euphorbia subgenus Euphorbia in Ethiopia" (PDF). Collectanea Botanica. 21: 72–73. doi:10.3989/collectbot.1992.v21. ISSN 0010-0730. Retrieved March 12, 2012.
